description: Updates the specified Data Lake Analytics account to include the additional Data Lake Store account.

data_lake_store_account_name.description: The name of the Data Lake Store account to add.

parameters.description: The details of the Data Lake Store account.

properties.description: The Data Lake Store account properties to use when adding a new Data Lake Store account.

subscription_id.description: Get subscription credentials which uniquely identify Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.

resource_group_name.description: The name of the Azure resource group.

account_name.description: The name of the Data Lake Analytics account.
